FuncDef: This command formats the compact flash. The compact flash must be shut down before starting the format.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the compact flash type. Values-cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
Enables the reliance file system and disables the default DoS file system. This option is valid only on compact flashes 1 and 2.
